:::: {.content-visible unless-format="revealjs"}
::: {.callout}
Reports will not include data or artifacts from archived models.^[[Archive and delete models](/guide/model-inventory/archive-delete-models.qmd)]
:::

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa square-poll-vertical >}} Analytics**.

1. Click on the tab for the type of reports you want to review.

1. For each of the bar or pie charts, hover for numerical breakdowns or click on individual sections to get a more detailed view.

    For example, to see all validation issues related to specific risk area:

    a. Click on the **Validation Issues** tab.
    b. Under **Validation Issues by Risk Area**, click on the risk area you want more details for.
    c. On the page that opens, the applicable validation issues are listed:
        - Filter this list of validation issues^[[Filter and sort artifacts](/guide/model-validation/view-filter-artifacts.qmd#filter-and-sort-artifacts)]
        - Or customize column headers that display on this validation issue view^[[Customize artifact layouts](/guide/model-validation/customize-artifact-layouts.qmd)]
    d. To get more details on the validation issue itself, click on the title of the validation issue to take you to the **{{< fa triangle-exclamation >}} Validation Issues** section for the specific model the issue applies to.

::::

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa square-poll-vertical >}} Analytics**.

2. Click on the tab for the type of reports you want to review.

3. For each of the bar or pie charts, hover for numerical breakdowns or click on individual sections to get a more detailed view.

    For example, to see all validation issues related to specific risk area:

    a. Click on the **Validation Issues** tab.
    b. Under **Validation Issues by Risk Area**, click on the risk area you want more details for.
    c. On the page that opens, the applicable validation issues are listed:
        - [Filter this list of validation issues](/guide/model-validation/view-filter-artifacts.qmd#filter-and-sort-artifacts){target="_blank"}
        - Or customize column headers that display on this [validation issue view](/guide/model-validation/customize-artifact-layouts.qmd){target="_blank"}
    d. To get more details on the validation issue itself, click on the title of the issue to take you to the **{{< fa triangle-exclamation >}} Validation Issues** section for the specific model the validation issue applies to.
